name: Last One There
description:
** WARNING This game contains some strong language, sudden loud noises and disturbing imagery.** 

Hey you! You're invited to the party of the century! Er... well month. After all, nothing goes better together than parties, Halloween and college students! We'll send you an invite and a map the night before. And don't forget the costume contest! Winner takes all!

You and your friends are on your way to the biggest Halloween party of the year. Its always in a new secret location, so you all try to get there in one piece, hoping that The Scrappie Killer, who recently escaped prison, isn't thirsting for more blood.

Follow Camilla, Jesse, Tanner and Sequinn on their short, if not eventful, walk through some dark scary woods just to get drunk until 2 AM. Hopefully you can survive the night. 

Made in 2 weeks for the 3rd Annual Spooktober Game Jam with a team of 3! Its our first time making a game so please leave a comment!

This is a prototype. We hope move this game forward to have another route with 2 new endings, more minigames, more expressions, full voice acting and more!

F E A T U R E S

- Multiple endings and branching storylines

- Quirky cast of sarcastic characters.

- An equally sarcastic narrator.

- Hidden Object Minigame.

- Full ending illustration.

-Choice of 3 costumes for you to pick from!

- A short spooky adventure at 6,800 words.

C R E D I T S

Creative  Director/Artist: PotaytoFysh (Dom)

Lead Programmer: Donobuz (Donovan)

Lead Writer: Larainbow

Sound Effects: Mixkit (https://mixkit.co/)

Music

Moon Juice - PublicPool  (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/moon-juice)

Tootsie Pop Blues - PublicPool (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/tootsie-pop-blues) 

Fright Fest - PublicPool  (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/fright-fest)

Jumping for Fun - PublicPool (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/jumping-for-fun)

Skeleton Jive - PublicPool (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/skeleton-jive)

The Woods - PublicPool (https://soundcloud.com/public-pool/the-woods)

Anime Race - Alex Rufire (https://audiojungle.net/item/anime-race-kit/33869787)

Young Summer - CrazyTunes (https://elements.envato.com/the-young-summer-party-fun-90s-dance-kids-MJRUSXF)

Suspicious - Myuu (https://soundcloud.com/myuu/suspicious)

Bathroom, Bedroom and Outdoor Table background made by: Noraneko Games (https://noranekogames.itch.io/yumebackground)
